title: WNS Named a ‘Leader’ in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Finance and Accounting BPO
content:
NEW YORK & MUMBAI, India --(BUSINESS WIRE)--Jun. 9, 2014-- WNS  (Holdings)
      Limited (WNS) (NYSE:WNS), a leading provider of global Business Process
      Management (BPM) services has been named a ‘Leader’ in the Gartner Magic
      Quadrant for Finance and Accounting (F&A) BPO * for the
      fourth year in a row. 
 

      “We believe this recognition is a testament to WNS’s ability to deliver
      best-in-class F&A solutions that optimize financial service processes,
      transform finance operations, provide actionable insights and lower
      costs. WNS has over 17 years of deep domain experience and a
      technology-led global delivery model that is currently providing F&A
      solutions to over 80 clients across multiple industries,” said Keshav R.
      Murugesh, Group CEO, WNS. 
 

      According to the report, a ‘Leader’ is performing well today, both with
      a clear vision of market direction and by actively building competencies
      to sustain the leadership position in the market. A ‘Leader’ has a
      superior understanding of client needs and of current market conditions,
      and they are actively building competencies to sustain their leadership
      position in the F &A BPO market across multiple regions. 
 

      WNS delivers industry-specific F&A
      solutions to world’s leading organizations across verticals,
      including airlines, travel, shipping and logistics, banking &financial
      services, insurance, healthcare & pharmaceuticals, retail,
      manufacturing, utilities, telecom, and media & entertainment. 
 

      WNS manages critical financial F&A functions for its clients globally,
      including management accounting, budgeting & forecasting, financial
      analysis, decision support, tax &treasury, risk management, control and
      compliance. End-to-end service offerings include Source-to-Pay,
      Order-to-Cash, Record-to-Report, Tax, Treasury, and Financial Planning
      &Analysis. WNS’s F&A solutions are delivered by leveraging deep
      domain expertise , analytics
      capabilities , automation
      tools and technology-enabled
      platforms . 
 

      WNS began providing F&A solutions in 1996, and today has more than 8,000
      employees delivering support, services and solutions to over 80 global
      clients.

 About WNS  
 
 WNS (Holdings) Limited (NYSE: WNS), is a leading global business process
      management company. WNS 
      offers business value to 200+ global clients by combining operational
      excellence with deep domain expertise in key industry verticals
      including Travel, Insurance, Banking and Financial Services,
      Manufacturing, Retail and Consumer Packaged Goods, Shipping and
      Logistics, Healthcare and Utilities. WNS 
      delivers an entire spectrum of business process management services such
      as finance and accounting, customer care, technology solutions, research
      and analytics and industry specific back office and front office
      processes. As of March 31, 2014 , WNS 
      had 27,020 professionals across 34 delivery centers world-wide including China , Costa Rica , India , the Philippines , Poland , Romania , South
      Africa , Sri Lanka , the United Kingdom and the United States . For more
      information, visit www.wns.com .
